thread.title: Beyonce and Jay Z release amazing collaboration with DJ Khaled after Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Beyonce and Jay Z release amazing collaboration with DJ Khaled after Grammy Awards

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Beyonce and Jay Z release amazing collaboration with DJ Khaled after Grammy Awards
text:
Beyonce and Jay Z release amazing collaboration with DJ Khaled after Grammy Awards The loved up couple dropped the track not long after confirming they're expecting twins Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Beyonce and Jay Z release collaboration with DJ Khaled Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Beyonce and Jay Z have teamed up for an exciting duet with DJ Khaled - and it has already dropped after the Grammy Awards 2017. 
The global superstars - who recently revealed they are expecting twins together as their family grows - both show off their talents on the new track Shining, which was unveiled on the rapper's Tidal streaming service on Monday. 
Bey herself - who nabbed the prize of Best Urban Contemporary Album on Sunday evening - sings the lines: "All of this winnin', I been losin' my mind." DJ Khaled single Shining feat. Beyonce & Jay Z (Photo: Instagram) 
Khaled introduces the fresh single, saying: "I worked my whole life for this one." Read More 
By the time Jay drops in with his own rhymes, the song really hits its stride and sounds as amazing as everyone would hope. He announced the track on Instagram (Photo: Instagram) He's very grateful for the collaboration (Photo: Instagram) 
"THANK YOU SO MUCH BEYONCE & JAY Z IM FOREVER GRATEFUL," Khaled wrote on Instagram as he unveiled the adorable cover art for the record. 
Queen Bey was nominated in the Best Album category at the Grammys this weekend, and although she didn't come out on top, she didn't leave empty handed. The duo looked amazing at the Grammys (Photo: Getty Images North America) Beyonce is pregnant with twins (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Adele was revealed as the winner of the coveted gong, and gave a huge shout out to the Halo singer before breaking the award in half to give a piece to her hero . Read More Adele and Beyonce's love affair at the Grammy Awards was beautiful - "I want you to be my mummy" 
Refusing the award, the south London singer said: "I can't possibly accept this award, and I'm very humbled and very grateful and gracious but my life is Beyonce, and the album to me, the Lemonade album, Beyonce, was so monumental, and so well thought out."
